abstract: Aristide Benoît Zogbo (born December 30, 1981 in Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire) is an Ivorian football goalkeeper.
comment: Aristide Benoît Zogbo (born December 30, 1981 in Abidjan, Côte d'Ivoire) is an Ivorian football goalkeeper.
name: Aristide Benoit Zogbo
